errors.error_description: Installation steps are in wrong order - dependencies are installed before creating virtual environment
correction_candidates: Create virtual environment first, then install dependencies inside it
Install GPkit first, then install the dependencies afterwards
Use conda to create environment and install all packages together
Install dependencies globally, then create virtual environment for GPkit only
errors.golden_answer: Create virtual environment first, then install dependencies inside it

errors.error_description: Missing critical dependency installation for cvxopt solver
correction_candidates: Add pip install cvxopt to the dependency installation commands
Add conda install cvxopt to the dependency installation commands
Add apt-get install cvxopt-dev to the dependency installation commands
Add pip install cvxpy cvxopt to the dependency installation commands
errors.golden_answer: Add pip install cvxopt to the dependency installation commands
